name: The Fire of '98
description:
Overview

Years ago, a whole city block burned down in the Fire of '98. Investigators ruled it was a tragic accident and it lives on as an unfortunate accident for the locals in the area.
But the recently discovered bodycam footage of Constable Kenneth Abbey, a rookie police officer who follows the trail to find out what really happened back in the Fire of '98, tells a different story...

The Fire of '98 is a short psychological horror-shooter. It takes approximately 30 minutes to complete. It is recommended to play this game with headphones in a dark environment.

Warnings

Health Warning: This game contains bright flashing lights in areas at intense contrast. It is recommended those with photosensitivity proceed at your own risk.

Content Warning: This game contains depictions of institutional violence, violence with firearms, and disturbing or unsettling imagery.

Credits

Developed and designed by Devon Wiersma

Constable Jessie Harding voiced by Taylor Johnson

"Mother" by Kat

Special thanks to Eleanor Chan, Bren McNamara, Andrew Skarja and Jake Girton.

If you play this game on stream or make a video of it feel free to tag me and send it my way so I can promote it!
